text:
Van Cortlandt Park (Bronx):

A view of the Van Cortlandt vault, for generations the burial place of the Van Cortlandt family, on the heights once known as Vault Hill, to the northeast of the Van Cortlandt Mansion.

About 1901

Gift of the Urbrook Collection
title: Bronx: Van Cortlandt Park - Van Cortlandt Vault.

text:
Van Cortlandt Park (Bronx): Shown is the Van Cortlandt vault, for generations the burial place of the Van Cortlandts, on the heights known as Vault Hill, to the northeast of the Van Cortlandt Mansion.

About 1891

Gift of Urbrock Collection
title: Bronx: Van Cortlandt Park - Van Cortlandt Vault.

original_title: Bronx: Van Cortlandt Avenue - Bailey Avenue
text:
Van Cortlandt Avenue West, east side, south from near Bailey Avenue.

May 6, 1938.

P. L. Sperr.
